    Genetal Updates[edit]

    General[edit]

    • Game now starts at night time and turns to day once creeps spawn


    • Neutral creeps no longer increase their bounty over the course of the game
    • Neutral stacked gold bonus reduced from 40% to 30%


    • Roshan armor growth increased from 0.325 to 0.375


    • Radiant Ancient camp is now easier to stack


    • Added lore to all items


    • Rearranged some items in the shop (mostly ordering based on cost changes in recent years, but also in some cases moving from one category to another. Consumables are unchanged.)


    • When combining, items will attempt to be placed into the slot of their component that has the most similar active effect. For example, Magic Wand will combine onto Magic Stick, Bloodthorn will combine onto Orchid Malevolence, etc.

    Neutral Units Balance[edit]

    • Neutral ancients magic resistance reduced from 70% to 50%
    • Ancient Thunderhide's Frenzy ability no longer interrupts movement when cast by a neutral
    • Ancient Thunderhide's Slam ability no longer interrupts movement when cast by a neutral
    • Ancient Thunderhide's Slam damage increased from 70 to 250
    • Ancient Thunderhide's Slam slow increased from 25% to 60%
    • Ancient Thunderhide's Slam radius increased from 250 to 350
    • Ancient Thunderhide's Accuracy Aura ability has now been moved to Ancient Rumblehide
    • Fixed Thunderhide Accuracy Aura not working properly
    • Ancient Granite Golem model size increased
    • Black Dragon Fireball cooldown increased from 10 to 15
    • Alpha Wolf unit level increased from 4 to 5
    • Ghost Base attack time increased from 1 to 1.2

    Aghanim's Shards[edit]

    • Added a new item: Aghanim’s Shard
    • Costs 1400 Gold. All heroes have their own custom shard upgrade as part of this update which permanently adds a new ability or improves an existing one. Can be purchased starting at 20 minutes and gets consumed immediately when it's given to your hero (like Aghanim's Blessing).
    • You can now check what Scepter and Shard upgrades do for the selected hero directly in the Hero UI, next to their abilities, as well as which ones are active. Consumed Scepter buffs no longer shows up as a buff icon mixed in with other buffs. Alt-Clicking on the Scepter and Shard UI will notify your allies whether the selected hero owns that upgrade.

    Heroes[edit]

    Abaddon[edit]

    • Aphotic Shield cast point reduced from 0.4 to 0.3
    • Borrowed Time scepter duration increased from 5/6/7 to 6/7/8
    • Level 15 Talent increased from +48 Mist Coil Heal/Damage to +50
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +6 Armor to +65 Damage
    • Level 20 Talent changed from +80 Damage to +8 Armor
    • Level 25 Talent increased from 375 AoE Mist Coil to 425
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Mist Coil and Aphotic Shield
        • Apply a Curse of Avernus stack on enemies.
        • Increases Curse of Avernus base slow by 6%.

    Alchemist[edit]

    • Unstable Concoction manacost reduced from 120 to 90/100/110/120
    • Unstable Concoction cooldown reduced from 22/20/18/16 to 16
    • Acid Spray damage increased from 15/20/25/30 to 20/25/30/35
    • Acid Spray first damage instance is now immediate rather than after a second
    • Gold bonus cap reduced from 18/22/26/30 to 18/21/24/27 (last hit count from 5/7/8/9 to 5/6/7/8)
    • If an ally already has a scepter buff or the item, it refunds them based on which version they have (either 4200 or 5800).
    • Alchemist granted scepter buffs provide the full stat bonuses.
    • Scepter damage/spell amp bonus reduced from 30/6 to 20/5
    • Level 20 Talent reduced from +30% Cleave to +25%
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Grants Berserk Potion
        • Throws a potion at the target ally, applying a basic dispel and granting +50 Attack Speed and +40 HP Regen for 10 seconds.
        • Cast Range: 800. Cooldown: 45. Manacost: 125. Can be used on self.

    Ancient Apparition[edit]

    • Ice Blast max travel time improved from 2 seconds to 1.75
    • Chilling Touch manacost reduced from 30/50/70/90 to 30/45/60/75
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Ice Vortex
        • Deal 40 DPS and reduces attack speed by 20

    Anti-Mage[edit]

    • Mana Break max burn reduced from 1/2/3/4% to 1/1.8/2.6/3.4%
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +12 Agility to +8 Armor
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +325 Blink Cast Range to +300
    • Level 20 Talent changed from Blink Uncontrollable Illusion to +0.1 Mana Void Damage Multiplier
    • Scepter Rework
      • Grants Blink Fragment
        • Blinks an illusion at the target enemy or location and attacks them for 7 seconds. Uses Blink's Cast Range. Illusion cannot be controlled, deals 50% damage, takes 250%.
        • Casting Counterspell also casts it on the Fragment illusion. Cooldown: 20. Manacost: 50
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Counterspell
        • Successful Counterspell creates an illusion attacking the caster for 5 seconds.
        • Removes Counterspell manacost.

    Arc Warden[edit]

    • Strength gain reduced from 3.0 to 2.8
    • Level 10 Talent reduced from +300 Flux Cast Range to +250
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +15% Cooldown Reduction to +12%
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from 50 Attack Speed to 40
    • Level 20 Talent changed from -1.5s Spark Wraith Cooldown Reduction to +150 Spark Wraith Damage
    • Level 25 Talent changed from +250 Spark Wraith Damage to +12s Tempest Double Duration
    • Scepter Rework
      • After impacting an enemy, Spark Wraiths now spawn a new Wraith, which then starts its activation period.
      • Has a 3 second spawn delay. Duplicated Wraiths do not duplicate again
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Magnetic Field
        • Now pushes enemies out of the area at cast time, and provides allies in it with +20% Magic Resistance.

    Axe[edit]

    • Battle Hunger cast range rescaled from 750 to 700/775/850/925
    • Level 10 Talent changed from +20 Movement Speed to +1.75 Mana Regen
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +2 Mana Regen to +25 Movement Speed
    • Level 15 Talent changed from Attacking Procs Counter Helix to +300 Health
    • Scepter Rework
      • Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected units. Lowers Berserker's Call cooldown by 2 seconds.
      • Battle Hunger also reduces enemy armor by 7 and grants you 7 per affected target (half on creeps).
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Causes your attacks to have a chance to proc a Counter Helix.
      • Attack procs ignore Counter Helix cooldown. Provides +20 Attack Speed.

    Bane[edit]

    • Night vision improved from 800 to 1200
    • Brain Sap damage type changed from Magical to Pure
    • Brain Sap damage reduced from 100/200/300/400 to 75/150/225/300
    • Brain Sap scepter no longer improves the cast point.
    • Brain Sap cast point reduced from 0.4 to 0.2
    • Fiend’s Grip damage type changed from Magical to Pure
    • Fiend’s Grip damage reduced from 100/155/215 to 80/120/160
    • Swapped the Nightmare and Enfeeble hotkeys
    • Reworked Enfeeble
      • Reduces all attack damage by 25/35/45/55%, regeneration by 25/35/45/55% and cast speed by 30%.
      • Lasts 8 seconds. Does not pierce Spell Immunity.
      • Cooldown: 20/16/12/8. Cast Range: 1100. Manacost: 40/50/60/70. Cast Point: 0.2
    • Level 15 Talent increased from +9% Spell Amp to +12%
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +125 Cast Range to +100
    • Level 25 Talent reduced from +200 Brain Sap Damage/Heal to +150
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Fiend’s Grip
        • Fiend’s Grip now creates an uncontrollable illusion that is also channeling Fiend’s Grip on the target.
        • Illusion takes 750% incoming damage and immediately dies if it is interrupted.
        • Multiple Fiend’s Grip effects do not stack on the target.

    Batrider[edit]

    • Base armor increased by 1
    • Sticky Napalm no longer does less damage to creeps
    • Sticky Napalm damage per stack reduced from 10/15/20/25 to 6/12/18/24
    • Sticky Napalm turn rate slow reduced from 40/50/60/70% to 10/30/50/70%
    • Sticky Napalm radius increased from 375 to 375/400/425/450
    • Firefly movement speed decreased from 4/7/10/13% to 3/6/9/12%
    • Flaming Lasso cooldown increased from 100/90/80 to 120/115/110
    • Flaming Lasso cast range increased from 100 to 175
    • Flaming Lasso scepter secondary range increased from 550 to 600
    • Level 20 Talent increased from +25 Movement Speed to +30
    • Level 20 Talent changed from +12% Cooldown Reduction to 2 Flamebreak Charges
    • Level 25 Talent changed from -10s Flamebreak Cooldown to -35s Flaming Lasso Cooldown
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Flaming Lasso
        • Allows Flaming Lasso to be cast on an allied hero, granting them 80% damage reduction.
        • Has 20 second cooldown when used on allies.

    Beastmaster[edit]

    • Wild Axes damage per axe increased from 30/60/90/120 to 40/70/100/130
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +200 Hawk Vision to +3 Mana Regen
    • Level 20 Talent changed from +450 Health to +50 Wild Axes Damage
    • Level 25 Talent changed from +100 Wild Axes Damage to +350 Health Beastmaster Controlled Units (affects Beastmaster and all of his summoned units)
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Call of the Wild Hawk
        • Hawks become controllable and gain Dive Bomb.
        • Channels for 1 second, revealing itself, and then flies towards the target enemy, dealing 175 damage and stunning them for 1 second, killing the hawk.
      • Cast Range: 500.

    Bloodseeker[edit]

    • Base intelligence reduced from 21 to 17
    • Bloodrage hp cost reduced from 2.2/2.3/2.4/2.5 to 2%
    • Bloodrage attack speed increased from 50/80/110/140 to 60/90/120/150
    • Blood Rite damage reduced from 120/180/240/300 to 120/160/200/240
    • Blood Rite cooldown increased from 12 to 15/14/13/12
    • Blood Rite manacost increased from 70/80/90/100 to 90/100/110/120
    • Thirst non-hero heal increased from 8/12/16/20% to 11/14/17/20%
    • Thirst no longer provides half heal when within 300 range of dying creeps
    • Thirst now provides full heal (rather than half) when within 300 range of dying heroes
    • Thirst hero heal reduced from 12/18/24/30% to 10/15/20/25%
    • Rupture manacost reduced from 200/225/250 to 100/150/200
    • Rupture damage increased from 30/45/60% to 36/48/60%
    • Level 25 Talent reduced from -5s Blood Rite Cooldown to -4
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Bloodrage
        • Bloodrage attacks now deal 1.5% of the target’s max health as pure damage and heals you for that amount.
        • Only affects Bloodseeker.

    Bounty Hunter[edit]

    • Base movement speed increased from 315 to 320
    • Intelligence rescaled from 19 + 2 to 22 + 1.9
    • Shadow Walk slow increased from 14/20/26/32% to 16/24/32/40%
    • Track speed radius increased from 900 to 1200
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Track
        • Allies now gain 50% of Track speed boost.
        • Provides 800 vision around the Track target for your team.

    Brewmaster[edit]

    • Base agility reduced from 22 to 19
    • Drunken Brawler now passively provides 6/12/18/24% Evasion and 24% Critical Strike chance for 145/160/175/190% damage
    • Drunken Brawler can now be activated to provide 3x chance for evasion and critical strike and alternate between 20% slower and 40% faster for 5 seconds.
    • Drunken Brawler cooldown increased from 23/21/19/17 to 29/25/21/17
    • Primal Split Earth brewling armor increased from 3 to 3/5/7
    • Primal Split Earth brewling health rescaled from 1500/2200/3000 to 1400/2200/3000
    • Primal Split Earth Brewling hp regen increased from 1/2/2 to 2/4/6
    • Primal Split Storm hp regen increased from 1/2/2 to 2/4/6
    • Primal Split Storm magic resistance increased from 0 to 25%
    • Primal Split Storm health reduced from 1000/1500/1900 to 1000/1400/1800
    • Primal Split Fire Brewling armor increased from 0/3/6 to 0/4/8
    • Primal Split Fire Brewling hp regen increased from 2/4/4 to 2/4/6
    • Primal Split Fire Brewling now has 30% Status Resistance
    • Scepter Rework
      • Primal Split now has 2 charges and can be canceled at any time.
      • Your hero forms back on whichever brewling you canceled it from.
      • Charge replenish time is equal to the normal cooldown.
    • Level 10 Talent changed from +175 Health to +1s Thunder Clap Slow
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +2.5s Thunder Clap Slow to +30% Cinder Brew Damage/Duration
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +15% Magic Resistance to +350 Health
    • Level 25 Talent reduced from +120% Drunken Brawler Critical Strike Damage to +80%
    • Level 25 Talent changed from -65s Primal Split Cooldown to Brewlings Gain Drunken Brawler Passive
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Primal Split
        • Primal Split now creates a Void brewling.
        • Has Astral Pulse ability, affecting enemies in 500 AoE.
        • Applies a 20/30/40% slow and Disarm for 2.5 seconds. Cooldown: 20.

    Bristleback[edit]

    • Warpath bonus damage increased from 22/28/34 to 25/30/35
    • Viscous Nasal Goo Scepter now also increases max stacks from 4 to 8
    • Viscous Nasal Goo scepter radius increased from 825 to 950
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +5 Max Goo Stacks to +15 Attack Speed
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Grants Hairball
        • Coughs a quill filled hairball towards the target location.
        • Erupts at the location, hitting enemies in a 700 radius with Goo and two Quills.
        • Cast Range: 1500. Cooldown: 20. Manacost: 100.

    Broodmother[edit]

    • Agility gain reduced from 3.2 to 3.0
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Grants Silken Bola
        • Consumes 1 Spin Web charge and roots the target enemy for 2 seconds.
        • Cast Range: 900. Cooldown: 12. Manacost: 50.

    Centaur Warrunner[edit]

    • Stampede duration rescaled from 4 to 3.5/4/4.5
    • Stampede damage increased from 100/200/300% of your Strength to 200/250/300%
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +40 Damage to +1s Stampede Duration
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Double Edge
        • Causes Double Edge to increase your strength by 15% per hero hit for 12 seconds.
        • Duration refreshes per stack, up to 5 stacks.
        • Slows enemies by 15% for 2 seconds.

    Chaos Knight[edit]

    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Chaos Bolt
        • Chaos Bolt creates a Phantasm illusion attacking the target for the duration of the stun.
        • Increases cast range by 300.

    Chen[edit]

    • Divine Favor no longer has an active component
    • Holy Persuasion can now be cast on an already converted unit to teleport it to you or can be cast on your own hero to teleport all creeps to you
    • Level 10 Talent increased from +150 Health to +175
    • Level 10 Talent increased from +150 Cast Range to +175
    • Level 15 Talent changed from -32s Divine Favor Cooldown to +12% Penitence Slow
    • Level 25 Talent changed from +4 Holy Persuasion Max Units to +3 Holy Persuasion Max Units and 3 Charges
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Divine Favor
        • Allows Divine Favor to be cast on allies, teleporting them back home after 6 seconds.
        • Cooldown: 35. Manacost: 200. Cast Range: 500.

    • Summon Familiars damage increased from 20/40/60 to 25/50/75
    • Reworked Aghanim's Scepter
      • Grants Silent as the Grave
        • Turns you and familiars invisible and +20% movement speed, as well as upgrading your movement type to flying.
        • When you or your familiars exit invisibility, you deal 30% bonus damage for 4 seconds.
        • Lasts 35 seconds. Cooldown: 45. Manacost: 100
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Gravekeeper's Cloak
        • Allows you to cast Gravekeeper's Cloak to turn into Stone Form.
        • Restores up to 25% of your health. Cooldown: 60. Manacost: 300.

    Void Spirit[edit]

    • Level 20 Talent reduced from -5.5 Astral Step Charge Restore Time to -5
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Dissimilate
        • Adds a partial outer ring to Dissimilate. Increases damage by 125.

    Warlock[edit]

    • Level 20 Talent increased from +300 Shadow Word AoE to +500
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Shadow Word
        • Shadow Word now provides +20/-20% movement speed on allies/enemies.

    Weaver[edit]

    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades The Swarm
        • Causes The Swarm to latch onto and reveal invisible units.
        • Causes Geminate Attack to also launch an extra attack onto other enemies within 1200 range of the attack target that have Beetles attached to them.
        • Reduces The Swarm cooldown by 4 seconds.

    Windranger[edit]

    • Windrun scepter movement speed reduced from 45% to 40%
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Powershot
        • Powershot now becomes global, but after reaching its default range, it only affects heroes (max 1 hero).
        • Impacted heroes will be killed if they are under 13% health after taking the impact damage.
        • Kill threshold scales based on powershot channel duration.

    Winter Wyvern[edit]

    • Base damage increased by 2
    • Cold Embrace base heal per second increased from 20/26/32/38 to 30/35/40/45
    • Arctic Burn scepter mana cost reduced from 30 to 20
    • Arctic Burn scepter upgrade also increases your movement speed by 25%
    • Level 25 Talent increased from +1.2s Winter's Curse Duration to +1.5
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Cold Embrace
        • When Cold Embrace ends, a Splinter Blast goes off at that location, hitting enemies within 1200 range.

    Witch Doctor[edit]

    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Grants Voodoo Switcheroo
        • Turns you into a Death Ward for 2 seconds.
        • Death Ward has -30 Attack Speed.
        • You are hidden/invulnerable during this time. Cooldown: 70. Manacost: 250.

    Wraith King[edit]

    • Reworked Mortal Strike. It is now a passive cooldown critical strike ability. Crit: 150/190/230/270%. Cooldown: 4
    • Reworked Vampiric Aura. Now called Vampiric Spirit. Provides you with 10/18/26/34% Lifesteal. Can be activated to summon skeletons (same numbers as when it was on Mortal Strike). Skeletons also have the Vampiric Spirit ability.
    • Scepter upgrade now buffs Wraith units with +75 Attack Speed and +25% Movement Speed
    • Level 20 Talent changed from No Reincarnation Mana Cost to +30 Movement Speed
    • Level 25 Talent changed from +20% Vampiric Aura to -2s Mortal Strike Cooldown
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Reincarnation
        • Causes Reincarnation to not have a mana cost and spawns three skeletons to attack each nearby enemy hero when Reincarnation is triggered.

    Zeus[edit]

    • Thundergod's Wrath manacost increased from 250/350/450 to 300/400/500
    • Thundergod's Wrath cooldown increased from 120 to 130/125/120
    • Level 10 Talent reduced from +1.5 Mana Regen to 1.25
    • Level 20 Talent changed from +12% Cooldown Reduction to +100 Thundergod's Wrath Damage
    • Level 25 Talent reduced from +115 Arc Lightning Damage to +100
    • Added Aghanim's Shard
      • Upgrades Static Field
        • Static Field can be cast to perform a Heavenly Jump, shocking the closest visible enemy (hero priority) within 2000 range, dealing Static Field damage to them and reducing their movement speed by 100% for 2.5 seconds.
        • If you were moving forward, you will jump towards that direction 450 distance. Cooldown: 14. Manacost: 100.

    Fluffy Hat[edit]

    • Costs 250 gold
    • Grants 125 Health

    • Requires Fluffy Hat, Sage's Mask, Blades of Attack and 225 gold recipe
    • Grants +150 Health, +1.6 Mana Regen, +10 Damage

    Orb of Corrosion[edit]

    • Requires Blight Stone, Orb of Venom, and a Fluffy Hat
    • Provides +150 Health, 13%/4% Slow, 3 Magic DPS, and 3 Armor reduction. Lasts 3 seconds

    Witch Blade[edit]

    • Requires Blitz Knuckles, Chainmail, Robe of the Magi and a 600 gold recipe.
    • Grants +35 Attack Speed, +12 Intelligence, +6 Armor and +300 Projectile Speed. Has a 9 second passive cooldown that procs on attacks, applying a curse for 3 seconds that slows by 25% and deals your Int as damage every second.

    Gleipnir[edit]

    • Requires Maelstrom, Rod of Atos and a 700 gold recipe.
    • Provides +30 Damage, +20 Intelligence, +12 Strength and +12 Agility. Passive: 160 damage Chain Lightning proc
    • Active: Targets a 450 AoE area, releasing a lightning strike onto each enemy unit, ensnaring them for 2 seconds and dealing a chain lightning damage proc for 220 damage. Cast Range: 1100. Manacost: 200

    Mage Slayer[edit]

    • Requires Cloak, Blade of Alacrity, Claymore and 600 gold recipe.
    • Grants +20% Magic Resistance, +20 Agility, +20 Damage and causes your attacks to place a -35% Spell Amp debuff on enemy heroes lasting 4 seconds.

    Eternal Shroud[edit]

    • Requires Hood of Defiance, Voodoo Mask and a 1100 gold recipe.
    • Grants +8.5 HP Regeneration, +20% Hero Spell Lifesteal and +4% Creep Spell Lifesteal.
    • Can be activated to create a shield that absorbs up to 400 magical damage and converts it to mana. Lasts 12 seconds. Cooldown: 60. Manacost: 50

    Helm of the Dominator[edit]

    • Helm of the Dominator can now be upgraded to Level 2 by buying Ultimate Orb and a 1600 gold recipe.
    • Allows converting Ancients. Minimum health increased to 1800. Increases stat/armor/hp regen bonuses from 6/6/6 to 20/8/8

    Overwhelming Blink[edit]

    • Requires Blink Dagger, Reaver and a 1750 Gold Recipe.
    • Grants you +25 Strength, and when you land at a destination, all enemies in a 800 AoE have 50% movement slow and 50 attack slow for 6 seconds and take damage equal to 200 + 100% of your strength.

    Swift Blink[edit]

    • Requires Blink Dagger, Eaglesong and a 1750 Gold Recipe
    • Grants you +25 Agility, and when you land at a destination, you gain 30% phased movement speed, and +40 Damage and +40 Attack Speed for 6 seconds.

    Arcane Blink[edit]

    • Requires Blink Dagger, Mystic Staff and a 1750 Gold Recipe
    • Grants you +25 Intelligence, and when you land at a destination, gain -50% Cast Point and 25% Ability Cooldown Reduction for 6 seconds. Does not affect items.

    Wind Waker[edit]

    • Requires Euls, Mystic Staff and a 1600 gold recipe.
    • Grants +50 Movement Speed, +6 Mana Regen, +35 Intelligence. Extends the Cyclone functionality to allow casting on allies. When cast on yourself, you can move the tornado anywhere at a speed of 360.
